  mpan(wdisj(hs1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0))), cesum(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(chash, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))

  syl(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wceq(cfv(cres(chash, c0), cuni(cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))

  esumeq2dv(hs1, cv(hs0), cfv(cres(chash, c0), cv(hs1)), cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))

  elpwi(cv(hs0), c0)
  fvres(cv(hs1), c0, chash)
  ismeas(hs0, hs1, c0, cres(chash, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(csiga))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cres(chash, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(chash, c0))

thm cntmeas(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra)→(# |` c0)∈(measures ` c0))
} = {
  mpbir3and(c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra), (# |` c0)∈(measures ` c0), ((# |` c0): c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)), ((# |` c0)` ∅)= 0, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(c0),((hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1))→((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)= sum*(hs1 ∈ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1)))))

  mp2an(((# |` c0): c0 →(0[[,]]+∞)), (# : 𝕌 →(0[[,]]+∞)), c0 ⊆ 𝕌)

  fssres(chash, universe, (0[[,]]+∞), c0)
  syl6eq(((# |` c0)` ∅), nat0, (# ` ∅), c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra))
  syl(c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra), ((# |` c0)` ∅)=(# ` ∅), ∅ ∈ c0)
  0elsiga(c0)
  fvres(emptycls, c0, chash)

  ralrimiva(hs0, P(c0), c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra), ((hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1))→((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)= sum*(hs1 ∈ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1))))
  ex((c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra)∧ hs0 ∈ P(c0)), (hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1)), ((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)= sum*(hs1 ∈ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1)))
  3eqtr4d(((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0), sum*(hs1 ∈ hs0,((# |` c0)` hs1)), (# ` ⋃ hs0), sum*(hs1 ∈ hs0,(# ` hs1)), ((c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra)∧ hs0 ∈ P(c0))∧(hs0[≼]_om ∧ ⊔(hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1))))
  ad2antll((c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra)∧ hs0 ∈ P(c0)), hs0[≼]_om, ⊔(hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1), (# ` ⋃ hs0)= sum*(hs1 ∈ hs0,(# ` hs1)))

  vex(hs0)
  hasheuni(hs1, hs0, universe)

  imp((c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra)∧ hs0 ∈ P(c0)), hs0[≼]_om, ((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)=(# ` ⋃ hs0))
  r19.21bi(hs0, P(c0), c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra), (hs0[≼]_om →((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)=(# ` ⋃ hs0)))
  syl(c0 ∈ ⋃ ran(sigAlgebra), ∀(hs0 ∈ P(c0),(hs0[≼]_om →((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)=(# ` ⋃ hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ P(c0),(hs0[≼]_om → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0)))

  isrnsigau(hs0, c0)
  ralimi(hs0, P(c0), (hs0[≼]_om → ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0[≼]_om →((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)=(# ` ⋃ hs0)))
  imim2i(hs0[≼]_om, ⋃ hs0 ∈ c0, ((# |` c0)` ⋃ hs0)=(# ` ⋃ hs0))
  fvres(⋃ hs0, c0, chash)

  biantrur(wn(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cres(chash, cpw(c0))))), wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)))
  ax-mp(wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)), wcel(nat1, cr))

  syl2anc(wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(csn(nat1), cdm(cvol)), wss(csn(nat1), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, csn(nat1)), nat0))
